timeline.bodyText: e.getMessage() will be included in message printed by assertDoesNotThrow() hence no need to concat it manually.
timeline.author: xushiyan

timeline.bodyText: Changing log level from error to debug. It is a good practice to not print anything unless test case failed thus we tend to mute the output here when it's passing. Same to other similar changes below.
timeline.author: xushiyan
